data.name: controls
data.description: Enables or disables navigation controls (previous/next buttons).

data.name: stopOnHover
data.description: Pauses autoPlay when the user hovers over the slider.

data.name: slideDuration
data.description: Duration (in milliseconds) each slide stays visible before transitioning.

data.name: transitionDuration
data.description: Duration (in milliseconds) of the slide transition effect.

data.name: timer
data.description: Displays a timer indicating the remaining duration for the current slide.

data.name: activeSlide
data.description: Sets the initially active slide (starting from index 1).

data.name: controlButtonClasses
data.description: Custom classes for navigation control buttons.

data.name: indicatorContainerClasses
data.description: Custom classes for the container that holds slide indicators.

data.name: indicatorClasses
data.description: Custom classes for individual slide indicators.

data.name: indicatorActiveClasses
data.description: Custom classes for the active slide indicator.

data.name: timerClasses
data.description: Custom classes for the timer element.
